lines.text: Introduction  I am fanatical about my coffee, and like many with my addition, I am convinced that the best coffee is brewed in a French Press. The problem with the French Press is that, in order to clean the bowl, i.e., remove the coffee grinds after you have empted the press, you need to either bang the glass or plastic  bowl against the side of the trash can, scrape the grinds out with a spoon , and/or wash  the grinds down the kitchen sink.
